text: Fresh smoothies/salads/desserts on-the-go All your vegan heart desires in 1 place  Glow with the flow
Delicious lunch at GLOW I LOVE this place - it is like no other when it comes to creating the perfect blend of delicious, pretty and plentiful Salad plates.

I love being able to customize my salad and have the option of adding super foods such as goji berries and chia seeds to my salad ! You gotta try the ginger shot - perfect boost for the immune system !
This establishment is closed. Sign is still up and people are there but the door is locked and they don't serve food anymore.
Yummy green smoothies and crunchiest kale chips ever !!! You can also create your customized salad by selecting between a few bases such as quinoa or kale and add a variety of toppings
